rule.info: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method
Falsepositives: exclude legitimate logon scripts. penetration tests, red teaming.
Sigma UUID: 0a98a10c-685d-4ab0-bddc-b6bdd1d48458
https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1037/
